ideas.title: Etcd Distributed Locking with Lease Management
ideas.description: Implement sophisticated distributed locking mechanism using etcd leases with automatic renewal and deadlock detection for enterprise coordination

ideas.title: Elasticsearch Real-time Indexing Pipeline
ideas.description: Create high-performance real-time indexing pipeline with bulk operations, error recovery, and automatic mapping detection

ideas.title: Etcd Cluster Auto-healing and Member Recovery
ideas.description: Implement intelligent cluster healing that automatically detects failed members, initiates recovery procedures, and maintains quorum

ideas.title: Elasticsearch Query Optimization Engine
ideas.description: Build AI-powered query optimizer that analyzes search patterns and automatically optimizes query performance and index strategies

ideas.title: Etcd Configuration Versioning and Rollback
ideas.description: Implement configuration versioning system with atomic updates, rollback capabilities, and change tracking for enterprise config management

ideas.title: Multi-Elasticsearch Cluster Federation
ideas.description: Create federation layer that allows seamless searching and indexing across multiple Elasticsearch clusters with load balancing

ideas.title: Etcd Backup and Disaster Recovery Automation
ideas.description: Implement automated backup system with incremental snapshots, cross-region replication, and point-in-time recovery capabilities

ideas.title: Unified Database Operator Interface
ideas.description: Create unified interface that abstracts etcd and Elasticsearch operations behind consistent API for easier application integration

Etcd Backup and Disaster Recovery Automation

important.title: Elasticsearch Query Optimization Engine
